lines: Toumerane twensi roche,As' agay'oroch'oruya mono;Toumerane n'abaye bonsi,'S' oroche rwa Nyasae.
2. 'S'engegu y'oroche roria,Rw'amache akomesa;Totere na gosasima,Botamb' as' omogoko.
3. Gator' ang'e goika roche,Totige chigurube;'S' obuya natotorigwe,Aru' eyanga n'egutwa.
4. Bwango ntoik' aria roche,Tokore orogendo;Chinkoro chigoke mono,Totere n'omorembe.
